name: Barbecued Shrimp
keywords: dairy-free, gluten-free, nut-free, vegetarian, main course, shrimp, spices
recipeIngredient: 2 pounds medium-size shrimp, in the shell

recipeInstructions.text: In a bowl, combine the peppers, Tabasco and salt; whisk in the olive oil and lemon juice. Add the shrimp and toss to cover. Cover the bowl and refrigerate for at least 3 and up to 24 hours before cooking.
Heat a charcoal grill or a broiler. Cook the shrimp in their shells until pink, about 3 to 4 minutes on each side. Serve in the shell, or allow to cool and shell before serving.
